title: Easy local whisper inference & transcription server setup
description:
Make setting up a local whisper inference server and transcription management server super easy for end users.

## Architecture
- **transcription-manager** (Node): API gateway that wraps whisper.cpp server with simple JSON API, handles context bleed by rotating whisper instances after N requests
- **whisper.cpp server**: Actual inference, hardware-specific builds required for performance

## Current State
- transcription-manager lives in private Arcata monorepo (silvabyte/Arcata/apps/transcription-manager)
- whisper.cpp fork with build scripts at matsilva/whisper (feat/server-builds branch)
- Production runs at audio.audetic.link

## Goal
Open source both components so users can run locally instead of using hosted service:
```toml
[transcription]
provider = "audetic"
endpoint = "http://localhost:8080/api/v1/transcriptions"
```
